content: **knitted top top/singlet in drops safran piece is knitted bottom up with lace pattern and stocking stitch with v-neck size s - xxxl** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern e-349 yarn group a ---------------------------------------------------------- **size** s - m - l - xl - xxl - xxxl **yarn** drops safran from garnstudio belongs to yarn group a 150-200-200-200-250-250 g colour 72 chalk **needles** drops single pointed needles size 3 5 mm drops single pointed needles size 3 mm **knitting gauge** 24 stitches in width and 32 row vertically in stocking stitch = 10 x 10 cm note remember that needle size is only a suggestion if you have too many stitches on 10 cm switch to larger needles if you have too few stitches on 10 cm switch to smaller needles
